channel.title: 欢迎来到Travis的博客 :tada: on Blog of TravisChen
channel.description: Recent content in 欢迎来到Travis的博客 :tada: on Blog of TravisChen

item.title: Advanced
item.description: This is the advanced tag. Just like other listing pages in Blowfish, you can add custom content to individual taxonomy terms and it will be displayed at the top of the term listing.

item.title: Tag
item.description: Blowfish ha il pieno supporto per le tassonomie Hugo e si adatterà a qualsiasi impostazione tassonomica. Gli elenchi di tassonomia come questo supportano anche il contenuto personalizzato da visualizzare sopra l’elenco dei termini.

item.title: タグ
item.description: Blowfish は Hugo の分類システムを完全にサポートし、どのような分類システ

item.title: 高度なタグ
item.description: こちらは高度なタグです。 Blowfish の他のページの様に、個々の分類条項
